title: ContentObject
description: Defines the object that is passed, either by itself or within an array, to a step module for processing and is then used for writing documents

uri.description: The identifier for this content object. Will be a real URI value unless sourceQueryIsScript in the step, in which case it can be any value.

context.description: Defines properties that will affect how a document is written

collections.description: Defines the collections that the document will be written to. Currently not populated by default when passed to a step module.

originalCollections.description: Defines the collections that currently exist on the document

permissions.description: Defines the permissions that will be included when this document is written

roleId.description: MarkLogic-defined ID of the role associated with this permissions

capability.description: Either read, update, insert, or execute

metadata.description: Defines the metadata keys and values that will be included when the document is persisted

provenance.description: Defines changes to entity properties by a step

^.*$.description: The property name is the URI of the source document
The property name is the property name or XPath expression in the source document containing the altered value

destination.description: Property name or XPath expression for the altered value
